reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress flattering and perfect for fall, with good material quality and good value for money. The style receives positive feedback, and one customer notes it's great for holiday season with boots. The fit and size receive mixed reviews, with some finding it perfect while others say it's too long. The skirt visibility is a concern, as several customers mention it's very see-through. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great design and fit with Very low price!
items.body: I am amazed how attractive this dress is. I received compliment after compliment when I wore it to a special family event. I intend to purchase another in a different color! This experience has completely changed my mind about Amazon clothes shopping. It has become my first place to look for variety and price. Read more
items.author: Laurette Patterson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality great dress!
items.body: Love this dress. The top is a heavier ribbed knit. Nice quality. The skirt is a flowing softer material. It does not have a slit in it. In the picture she is just holding her skirt up. The buttons on the sleeves really dress it up. Great for the holiday season with boots Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured
items.body: I ordered the brown dress. I was super dissapointed when it arrived. The color was not at all like the picture. It was an orange/brown, in my opinion hideous. The waist was different than the one pictured as well. The gold accents shown on the sleeve were missing. Overall, did not look like the dress pictured at all. Read more
items.author: Pam Dim

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price

I wanted something a little warmer for a fall wedding I was attending and this was pefect at keeping me cozy but not hot! It was a last minute buy, if I had more time I probably wouldâ€™ve returned and got something else honestly just because it is kind of giving grandma vibes lol. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sadly, didn't fit me.
items.body: This dress is beautiful, and its value is what drew me to buy it. The material of sweater feels good, not to thick and soft. Loved the â€œsilky feel of the skirt too. Unfortunately, it didn't fit me the way I expected; the sleeves were too long for my liking, and it was too long for me (I'm 5â€™6â€). Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Super flattering and material looks so nice! Read more
items.author: sm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fall buy
items.body: I love this dress! It's comfortable and flattering. The sweater is thick enough but the lower portion is very thin and flowy. You may need to wear an added layer. True to size. Read more
items.author: Lakenderick Edwards

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Army, Navy, Black2, Strikhaki3. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
